item.title: Offset vs Seek/Keyset Pagination
item.description: Today I was focused on defining the standards for pagination on a new product and decided to dialog with a coworker. Below is the idea I threw out: Any list of items I return from the API will be in this format: { results: [], next: null, } The only thing that would identify the result as a part of pagination.. would be the value of the “next” key.
